Game.Name: Mahjong Cop Ryuu - Shiro Ookami no Yabou (Japan)
Game.plot: Mahjong Cop Ryuu: Shiro Ookami no Yabou is a Miscellaneous game, developed by Whiteboard and published by Sega,which was released in Japan in 1989.
Game.Notes: Mahjong Cop Ryuu: Shiro Ookami no Yabou (マージャンＣＯＰ竜 白狼の野望) is a 1989 mahjong game for the Sega Mega Drive by Sega.
